title: Disease Prevention Quiz | UCLA Health Library, Los Angeles, CA
description: Answer this one: Which is the most important hygiene habit to teach young children? Learn the answer to this and other prevention questions by taking this multiple choice quiz.
cleaned_text: You can do a lot to keep yourself healthy. Staying away from germs, eating a balanced diet, getting enough rest and exercise—all these steps and others can put you on the road to good health. How much do you know about preventing disease? Take this quiz and find out. Don't eat a large meal before bed Get plenty of exercise Make sure your bedroom is comfortable and free of electronic devices and other distracting items.
